abstract: A video on YouTube shows a man swaddling his patient cat in wrapping paper. Viewers may rather not know what has happened in the year since the video was made.
snippet: A video on YouTube shows a man swaddling his patient cat in wrapping paper. Viewers may rather not know what has happened in the year since the video was made.
lead_paragraph: One of the more “awww”-inspiring YouTube clips making the rounds this holiday season is “How to Wrap a Cat for Christmas,” a quasi-instructional clip in which a man gently encases his patient tuxedo cat, Flippy, in Santa-themed paper.

headline.main: ‘How to Wrap a Cat’ Video Has a Sad Footnote
